## Loading the dataset

```{r}
str(data)
```
```{r}
purchase_frequencies <- table(data$ProductNo)

# Identify Top Products
top_products <- names(sort(purchase_frequencies, decreasing = TRUE))[1:5]  

# Statistical Analysis
# Filter data for top products
top_products_data <- subset(data, ProductNo %in% top_products)

# Count purchase frequencies for top products
top_products_purchase_frequencies <- table(top_products_data$ProductNo)

# Chi-squared test
chi_squared_test <- chisq.test(top_products_purchase_frequencies)

# Print the results
print(chi_squared_test)
```
